Timecandy9.name: Timecandy9
Timecandy9.desc: Gives 1 Cosmic Time Candy, which can give up to 500 HOURS of AFK time! On average, it will give 24 hrs.

EquipmentPendant28.name: EquipmentPendant28
EquipmentPendant28.desc: Gives +35% EXP gain when killing monsters! Level up more, get more talent points... go harder, get better, go faster, get stronger! Also gives +5% monster respawn cuz why not lol

EquipmentRings32.name: EquipmentRings32
EquipmentRings32.desc: Helps you reach world 5! When Equipped, gives +30% Kills for things like opening portals and Deathnote, but ONLY IN WORLD 4.

EquipmentRings31.name: EquipmentRings31
EquipmentRings31.desc: Helps you reach world 4! When Equipped, gives +30% Kills for things like opening portals and Deathnote, but ONLY IN WORLD 3.

desc: Each purchase gives +7 daily teleports every day, forever. You can use these on the Map Screen. You can be gone for up to 4 days and claim them all upon your return!
Each purchase gives +10 daily teleports every day, forever. You can use these on the Map Screen. You can be gone for up to 4 days and claim them all upon your return!
